website_summaries.verdict: A traditional looking picnic table that is sturdy and made to fit kids.
pros: A wooden picnic table that looks nice in the backyard
A nice height, a little taller and will last kids a little longer than some other child-sized tables
Still small enough for little kids
Sturdy enough for an adult to sit on the benches
cons: While this picture makes it looked finished and this table can be purchased finished, this is actually the price and listing for the unfinished version

customer_reviews.title: it is the perfect size for our 2
customer_reviews.text: met all our expectations. we painted it hunter green and sealed it. it is the perfect size for our 2,4 and 5 yr old grandchildren. and it looks adorable in our backyard. Will use it year round in front of the window in our dining room!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Costello

customer_reviews.title: Kid's love it, nice and sturdy for cost
customer_reviews.text: Our kids have loved this thing! I am 6'3" and 230lbs and I can sit on it with them (not comfortable, but I can).
customer_reviews.author: Austin Bond

customer_reviews.title: JR Picnic Table
customer_reviews.text: Nice. I put it together easily and stained it. My grandson and friends like it.
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for my grandson. We stained and sealed it and it's great. He's making so much use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: gaps in table top
customer_reviews.text: Received this table today and when I took the top there is almost half inch gap between each board. Not at all like the picture showed. Too bad because it looks like a nice table. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: chuck r

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We decided on the unfinished after reading some negative reviews about the paint. We let our 4 year old grandson pick the color and it looks great. Perfect size for about four 4 year olds!
customer_reviews.author: R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: picnic table
customer_reviews.text: very easy to set up! minor little dents and stuff, but for the price! my 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I had expected, but overall a good purchase. Very easy to assemble (under 15 minutes) and the fact that is came unfinished was nice. Put on two layers of sealer and it has been fine out in the elements for the past month we have had it. Would recommend it for toddler use (under 6 y.o) and for not any more than 4 kids can use it. IMO, this one looks so much better and fits in naturally, with our back patio than the plastic picnic tables on the market.
customer_reviews.author: TheresaJ

customer_reviews.title: Well built, durable little table - just stain and you're ready to roll
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great little picnic table. Keep in mind it is small. You can fit two kids on each side if they are no older than perhaps 5 or 6. But this is built well. The wood took the stain easily, and it looks fantastic now; seems to be weathering the elements just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters, ages 2 and 3, and let them paint it. I had to polyurethane it to protect it but they absolutely love it and eat at it, play on it, etc. all the time.
customer_reviews.author: marcia roof

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Simply precious table for my one and three year old.
customer_reviews.author: amber

product_meta.title: Little Colorado Child's Picnic Table- Unfinished
product_meta.description:
This is the perfect toddler-sized picnic table for indoor and outdoor use. It is stable and sturdy enough to support 200 pounds and comes Partially assembled, so completion is easy with a few bolts. The hardware provided is zinc and nickel plated for the best weather resistance. All three available colors are Sherwin Williams water-based latex house Paint, so they are safe for your toddler and will hold up to the elements. Because we don't use solvent-based paint, we recommend that you store the Adirondack chair indoors when not in use in order to extend its life. the toddler picnic table pairs well with the Adirondack chair, Adirondack rocking chair, and Adirondack end table. 

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The perfect kid-sized picnic table for children aged two to seven. Handcrafted of solid Montana pine wood with rounded edges and safery in mind. The top and seats are pre-assembled so that final assembly is quick and easy. These picnic tables should be sealed and finished before use. Everything is sanded and ready for painting. Depending on the finish used, these picnic tables may be used indoors or outdoors. Perfect for do it yourself projects or where custom colors are desired. Made in Colorado. Compliant with the Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act.
feature_bullets: Finish it the way you want it
